# TOON NINJA

> Free online editor for TOON (Token-Oriented Object Notation). Convert JSON to TOON and reduce LLM token costs by 30-60%.

## What is TOON NINJA?
TOON NINJA is a web-based editor and converter for the TOON data format. It helps developers reduce token usage in LLM applications by converting JSON to the more efficient TOON format.

## Features
- Monaco editor with TOON syntax highlighting
- JSON to TOON conversion (bidirectional)
- Live syntax validation
- Diff comparison view
- Batch editing
- No signup required

## Pages
- /: Main editor
- /about: Learn about TOON format
- /convert: JSON to TOON converter
- /token-optimization: Reduce LLM costs
- /features: Editor features
- /compare: TOON vs JSON comparison

## Links
- Documentation: https://toonformat.dev
- Specification: https://github.com/toon-format/spec
